org.gbif.doi.services

Class BaseService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.doi.services.BaseService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataciteService, EzidService

    public abstract class BaseService
extends Object
    This class provides common methods to be used by all services.

      • post

        protected void post(URI uri,
        DataCiteMetadata data)
             throws DoiException
        Executes an HTTP POST request.
        Parameters:
        uri - to issue request against
        data - request body content to be serialized as XML with jackson
        Throws:
        DoiException - in case anything goes wrong during the request.

       DataCiteMetadata data)

        Executes an HTTP PUT request.
        Parameters:
        uri - to issue request against
        data - request body content to be serialized as XML with jackson
        Throws:
        DoiException - in case anything goes wrong during the request.

      • random

        protected org.gbif.api.model.common.DOI random(String prefix)
        Returns:
        a random DOI with the given prefix. It is not guaranteed to be unique and might exist already
